item.title: 2022 Q1 Events Listing
item.description: 2022 Q1 Events Listing Unless noted otherwise, all event time is at GMT+8 (Beijing time). Febuary, 2022 Date/Time Product Event Topics Join call or view recordings 14:00, Feb 17 “Bootstrapping Web3 mobile apps by DuoNB principles with ifanr Cloud" “用 DuoNB 原则结合知晓云开发 Web3 移动应用” To be hosted by ifanr.com, on Lark ———– (More to come…) Date/Time Industrial Event Topics Join call or view recordings 14:00, Feb 24 “Introducing DuoNB, the Web3 Tech Alliance on Narrow Band Networks" “DuoNB，基于窄带网络的 Web3 技术联网“ To be hosted by UIH, DuoTech, on Lark ———– (More to come…) March, 2022 Date/Time Product Event Topics Join call or view recordings 14:00, March XX “Introducing the DuoPlus Principles for Web3 app design with ifanr Cloud" ”在 DuoPlus 产品框架下设计 Web3 小程序“ To be hosted by ifanr.
